Question: On one such flight, this person performed an emergency landing as a result of fuel exhaustion.
Hints: Subsequent to the commencement of their relationship, a bitter dispute arose between this person, his children and D'Angelo.
Stationed in the United Kingdom at RAF Leiston, this person flew P-51 Mustangs in combat with the 363rd Fighter Squadron.
This person had gained one victory before he was shot down over France on his eighth mission, on March 5, 1944.
